```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

## Start from the template

Either

* Use the RStudio addin,

* Or run `roblog::ro_blog_post_md()` in RStudio,

* Or copy-paste the text below (hover, a copy-paste button will appear at the top-right corner of the shaded area).

```{r, echo = FALSE}
library("magrittr")
readLines(system.file("templates", "markdown-post.md",
                  package="roblog")) %>% 
  glue::glue_collapse(sep = "\n") -> x

glue::glue("````markdown\n{x}\n````") %>% 
  knitr::asis_output()
```
